Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Housing Authority to allow the City-Wide Task Force on Housing Court to set up an assistance table for the benefit of unrepresented residents outside NYCHA housing administrative tribunal hearings.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: City-Wide Task Force on Housing Court to set up an assistance table for the benefit of unrepresented residents outside NYCHA housing administrative tribunal hearings.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Housing Authority to allow the City-Wide Task Force on Housing Court to set up an assistance table for the benefit of unrepresented residents outside NYCHA housing administrative tribunal hearings.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Subcommittee
Items.MatterName: City-Wide Task Force on Housing Court to set up an assistance table for the benefit of unrepresented residents outside NYCHA housing administrative tribunal hearings.
